articles.description: Sotheby’s is reportedly paying $100 million to buy the former Whitney Museum building at 945 Madison Avenue. That seems like a low price given the value of buildings nearby and the artwork Sotheby’s sells. We spoke to brokers and experts about this.
articles.content: When one uptown townhouse broker heard that the Breuer Building  an architectural masterpiece located on one of the most expensive blocks in the entirety of New York City  had sold for $100 million, … [+2732 chars]
